fraseIntroducao: Now is the time to stay gome and use your time to evolve, work on your inner self and leave this moment as a better person
pergunta1: Did you experience any of the symptoms below?
subPergunta1: Cough, Fever, Sore throat, Runny nose, Body aches, Nausea, Shortness of breath
pergunta2: Have you had any contact with a suspected or confirmed case of COVID-19 in the past few days?
pergunta4: Do you still do your activities from home?
fotoPesquisaTexto: To complete the survey, take a picture of your face.
